snippet.title: Assasseed's Crin - Gold Trophy Run
snippet.description:
I had a lot of comments that the game was too difficult so here is a sample run where I show you how to get the gold trophy.
If you watch carefully, I use every ability (Blend in, Hayssassinate and Tower jump). Jumping from one building to another is also very helpful!

Sorry for the absence of sound, I forgot to record it and was too lazy to record another run :p

Hope you enjoy!

For those who haven't tried it yet, it's over here : http://oddly-shaped-pixels.itch.io/assasseeds-crin

R3nD
